name: Common Sense Media
goal: Common Sense is the nation's leading nonprofit organization dedicated to improving the lives of kids and families by providing the trustworthy information, education, and independent voice they need to thrive in the 21st century.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: GBPR - We have recently enlisted efforts to improve broadband data privacy regulations in the United States. The European Union is far ahead of the US in protecting consumers privacy online, and we're hoping to consult with members of parliament on best practices.
